name: turbo-speedo-video
description: A Raycast extension to adjust video playback speed using FFmpeg

scripts.dev: echo 'Install Raycast CLI: npm install -g @raycast/cli && raycast dev'
scripts.build: tsc && cp dist/index.js . && cp dist/index.d.ts . && cp -r dist/utils . && cp dist/adjust-video-speed.js . && cp dist/adjust-video-speed.d.ts . && cp -r utils /Users/tom/.config/raycast/extensions/turbo-speedo-video/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Note: Raycast extensions directory not found - copy utils folder manually if needed' && echo 'Build complete! Extension ready for Raycast'

author: tom
title: Turbo Speedo Video

commands.name: adjust-video-speed
commands.title: Adjust Video Speed
commands.description: Change video playback speed with FFmpeg

preferences.name: ffmpegPath
preferences.title: FFmpeg Path
preferences.description: Path to FFmpeg executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
